main event: An unidentified object was observed in the vicinity of Ft. Davis, Texas on April 29, 1953, believed to be some type of bird or lighting.
interesting points: The object was observed for 45 seconds before disappearing below the horizon., The sighting was reported by a civilian source., The observation type was ground-visual., The object was noted to be bird-like and flying at a high elevation., No physical evidence or photographs were documented in the report.
